text.0: o pusan bring us to the man who knows who shall direct us straight.
text.1: and say unto us it is here.
text.2: may we go forth with pūṣan who shall point the houses out to us.
text.3: and say to us these same are they.
text.4: unharmed is pūṣans chariot wheel the box neer falleth to the ground.
text.5: nor doth the loosened feliy shake.
text.6: pūṣan forgetteth not the man who serveth him with offered gift.
text.7: that man is first to gather wealth.
text.8: may pūṣan follow near our kine may pūṣan keep our horses safe.
text.9: may pūṣan gather gear for us.
text.10: follow the kine of him who pours libations out and worships thee.
text.11: and ours who sing thee songs of praise.
text.12: let none be lost none injured none sink in a pit and break a limb.
text.13: return with these all safe and sound.
text.14: pūṣan who listens to our prayers the strong whose wealth is never lost.
text.15: the lord of riches we implore.
text.16: secure in thy protecting care o pūṣan never may we fail.
text.17: we here are they who sing thy praise.
text.18: from out the distance far and wide may pūṣan stretch his right hand forth.
text.19: and drive our lost again to us.
